summary:
Adds a standalone, unique re-textured Spriggan Atronach to the game with balanced spells and stats to be on par with the other atronachs.
There's now an Optional File to replace Spriggans and Spriggan Matrons.
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------
[size=200]Forest Atronach Overview[/size]
------------------------------------------------

Ever felt that only 3 Atronachs wasn't enough? Well I took it as a challenge to implement a retextured Spriggan to the game that would fight alongside you and be a fun addition to your arsenal.

The spell will work with all relevant perks (e.g Elemental Potency) and if you complete the [b]Master Conjuration Quest[/b] the spellbook 'Forest Thrall' will be purchasable from any NPC that sells master conjuration spells to acquire a permanent leafy companion. ^__^

-------------------------------------------------
Features
-------------------------------------------------

- She will use her signature spell of Swarm Spray and will also use her Poison claws if confronted up close. The damage dealt by spells depends if Potent or not and if she's a Forest Thrall.

- She will NOT cast Call of the Wild unlike her sister spriggan which consists of converting random animals and at the same time become invisible. Was removed due to balancing and thought was a bit annoying.
-She will regenerate a fair amount of health if downed as a last resort.
-She has a high weakness to fire.

-------------------------------------------------
Location
-------------------------------------------------

You can find the Forest Atronach Spell book on the table inside the Whiterun Temple of Kynareth.

-------------------------------------------------
Compatibility
-------------------------------------------------

This mod should be compatible with most if not all mods out there. If any conflicts please do contact me.
This mod is mostly standalone as it will not conflict with Spriggans in any way. In that same sense its fully compatible with any Spriggan retextures or edits.
One thing that I DID edit from the main files are the leaves that fly around Spriggans. I made it more detailed and realistic as it was very bland. Don't think any mod out there has modified it but feel free to skip if a prompt ever arises.

-------------------------------------------------
Update Notes
-------------------------------------------------
Version 1.2
Bug fix: Spell has been corrected to be an apprentice spell instead of novice to reflect cost.
Version 1.1
Added Different 'Idle' Sound. So instead of the noisy swarm loop sound it will be a near-silent forest-like wind.

[right][url=http://www.youtube.com/channel/UC575SRgFG-lWvJ-KNBIjYHg/videos][img]http://imgur.com/5H2j1bF.png[/img][/url][/right]
author: Rengel
